```{r libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}

library(foreign)
library(htmltools)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(terra)
library(tidyverse)
library(raster)


```


```{r read shapefile, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
#  read shape
Area <- st_read("data/spatial/cup_final.shp") %>% 
  st_transform(crs = 5070) %>%
  st_union() %>%
  st_sf()
```

```{r locator map, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}


library(tmap)

# toggle tmap mode to interactive viewing
tmap_mode("view")

# create a quick interactive map
quickmap <- qtm(Area, 
                borders = "darkgreen", 
                fill = NULL, 
                check.and.fix = TRUE, 
                title = 'Assessment Area',
                basemaps = 'OpenStreetMap')

quickmap



```
